sense.def: ① Illness Sign identical with jing 痙① . Su wen 素問 45: 發喉痹，嗌腫，痓，治主病者 , “It develops into a throat block, a swollen throat region, and a spasms . Treat the [conduit] controlling the disease”.

② Pathological Condition identical with jing 痙② . Jin gui yao lue 金匱要略 Fj: 太陽病，發熱，脈沉而細者，名 曰痓 , “If someone suffers from major yang disease, effuses heat, and displays a movement in the vessels that is in the depth and fine, then this is spasms ”. In ancient Chinese medical literature, the two characters 痓 and 痙 had identical meanings and were used interchangeably.
①The emotion of fright. Su wen 素問 21: 凡人之驚恐恚勞動靜，皆為變也 , “Whenever a person is frightened , fearful, angry, or overworked, whether one is active or quiet, all this causes changes”.
